com.facebook.buck.apple

Class TargetSources

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.apple.TargetSources
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImmutableTargetSources

    @Value.Immutable
public abstract class TargetSources
extends Object
    Immutable value type which holds information on source file(s) used to build an Apple binary target.
